original_text: “Now put it back into your cloak,” he said. So Moses put his hand back into his cloak, and when he took it out, it was restored, like the rest of his flesh.
korean_text: 이르시되 네 손을 다시 품에 넣으라 하시매 그가 다시 손을 품에 넣었다가 내어보니 그의 손이 본래의 살로 되돌아왔더라

sentences.original_text: Now put it back into your cloak
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 그것을 다시 네 겉옷에 넣어라

sentences.original_text: So Moses put his hand back into his cloak
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 모세는 그의 손을 다시 겉옷에 넣었다

sentences.original_text: and when he took it out
like the rest of his flesh
